review: I am extremely satisfied with the On-Stage WS8540 Heavy Duty Mixer or Keyboard Stand. Its sturdiness and stability are top-notch, and the ability to adjust height, width, and depth is incredibly useful. The stand is easy to set up and folds into a compact T-shape, making it perfect for storage and transport. It’s a bit pricier, but the build quality and versatility make it a great value for money, especially for gigging musicians or studio work. No issues with noise or quality, and it works perfectly with my equipment. Highly recommend!
